educations.program: IT Systems Development in Geographical Information Systems
description: IT System Development in Geographical Information Systems focuses on the development of software and systems with a special direction on geographical information systems (GIS).
Development of basic skills in web programming with a focus on the client side. To produce web applications based on current standards and web technologies
Development of basic programming skills to build well-structured applications. To use .NET framework to develop useful programs with graphical user interface
Basic computer science concepts and processes: data structures and simple graphics.

educations.course: Preparation Course in Programming and Computer Science
description: Basic knowledge of computer and programming in Python.
How mathematic has evolved through the times.

projects.title: Flood application
projects.description: This project was created during the course GIS-application. The project would calculate and show the areas which could have risk for flood. Geographic information system (GIS) application that runs from a custom menu in ArcMap. The application allows the user to process a raster file.

projects.title: Web based map application
projects.description: Leaflet was used to build interactive map about hiking, hotels, restaurants and hostels in Sweden. Leaflet.GeometryUtil was assigned to use a method which returns the n closest layers from the chosen point of the user. Turfjs was used to calculate buffer a specific area and find points within multipolygons. ExtJS is an application framework to build interactive web applications by creating dynamic grids.
projects.tech_stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Leaflet, Leaflet.GeometryUtil, Turfjs, ExtJS

projects.title: Filofax
projects.description: The project was based on to create an application for saving daily notes. The application was created for two variants which were console and GUI (Graphical User Interface). The GUI variant was my first GUI application. The GUI variant was created with Tkinter.
